description: The epitomy of a "girl-next-door" type, Alexa Von Tess suffered beautifully for us in her first Waterbondage shoot. Some of her innocent reactions to the diabolical bondages and predicaments were priceless. Shes beautiful, flexible and determined to give her all in every scene. The tank scenes are a bit short, as she found out she has a bit of a water phobia problem when bound. Its kinda funny how many girls find that out here.
title: Alexa Von Tess
